edu.udo.cs.wvtool.generic.inputfilter
Class XMLInputFilter

java.lang.Object
  edu.udo.cs.wvtool.generic.inputfilter.XMLInputFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
WVTInputFilter
public class XMLInputFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements WVTInputFilter

Read XML Input ignoring the tags. The encoding is determined using information from the document info and not from the xml document itself.
